SinglePlayerController - Class in it.polimi.se2018.controller
This class extends the abstract Controller class and implements those behaviors that are different in Single Player and MultiPlayer mode: the main differences are in the management of the connection/reconnection of the Player, in the game's setting up, in the ToolCard's usage and in the end game scoring.
SinglePlayerController(Game, int, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.controller.SinglePlayerController
Creates a new controller for the Single Player mode associated to the specified game instance.
start() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.Game
Starts the game.

Starts the server.
start() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.RmiServer
The method to start the RMI server.
start() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.Server
Starts the server.
start() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.TcpServer
Starts the server launching a TcpGatherer and setting isRunning to true: the server is actually active and ready to receive client connections.
startDocument() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.SaxPatternBuilder
Initializes all attributes to their default value to correctly parse the xml file.
startElement(String, String, String, Attributes) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.SaxPatternBuilder
Handles the event that occurs when a new element is opened.
stop() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.HybridServer
Stops the server.
stop() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.RmiServer
The method to interrupt the sever.
stop() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.Server
Stops the server.
stop() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.TcpServer
Stops the server imposing the TcpGatherer to close the ServerSocket on which it is waiting for client connections, to shutdown the threadPool and setting isRunning to false: the server is not active anymore and it is not ready to receive client connections.
swap(Coordinates, Die) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.RoundTrack
Exchanges the die at the specified coordinates with the given one.
